item.title: Mighty Grip
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
These silicone discs are designed to be just flexible enough to exercise your grip. Choose between soft or hard depending on ability & desired grip strength.

  • Aids in the healing of injured wrists
  • Made of power elastic for total support
  • One size fits all, ideal for work or sports
  • Easily adjusted, convenient

The post Mighty Grip appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Mighty Grip appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: HotShotz Portable Heating Pad
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Never suffer the pains of cold or soreness again! Introducing HotShotz, the latest addition to the AT Surgical family of products. HotShotz are an incredible new heating pad that eliminates the wait time between needing heat and having it. With HotShotz you will always have a source of heat at the ready whether you need it to reduce stiffness & soreness or keep your hands warm in the long winter months. Instructions: https://youtu.be/6mrCihv7wY4

The post HotShotz Portable Heating Pad appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Heats up instantly!
  • Indoors: Great for Massage Therapy, Physical Therapy, Neck Pain, Back Pain, Joints, Sore Muscles, Cramps, Sports injuries, Poor Circulation, Arthritis and more
  • Outdoors: Stay warm while Camping, Hunting, fishing, Hiking, Skiing, Snowboarding, skating, Motorcycling, Sporting Events, Scuba Diving and more
  • Lasts approximately two hours
  • Portable

 

The post HotShotz Portable Heating Pad appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: AT- Surgical Premium Quality Reusable Washable Incontinence Underpads for Children or Adults
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Pressure redistributing cushion designed to assist in the prevention, treatment and management of pressure ulcers Viscous gel bladder is encased in a fire retardant polyurethane…

The post AT- Surgical Premium Quality Reusable Washable Incontinence Underpads for Children or Adults appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Pressure redistributing cushion designed to assist in the prevention, treatment and management of pressure ulcers
Viscous gel bladder is encased in a fire retardant polyurethane foam shell and provides optimal pressure redistribution, support and comfort
Top of cover is a urethane-coated nylon that is low-shear, vapor permeable and water-resistant. Fire Retardant polyurethane foam shell
Base of cover is waterproof vinyl for durability.Product Dimensions: 18″(L) x 16″(W) x 3″(H). Weight Capacity-Up to 20 inch 275 pounds. 22 inch and up 500 pounds
Removable and replaceable cover has water resistant “Top” and “Non-Slip” vinyl base.
Overall Product Height- 3 inches, Overall Product Length- 18 inches, Overall Product Width- 16 inches, Primary Product Material- Foam.This chair cushion convoluted foam allows passage of air and relief of pressure for long term use

Features:

  • Soft, wick-away material
  • Heavy-duty soaker
  • Uni-shield bearer
  • Seat pad has ties to attach it securely to chair, easy to fix or remove, high resilience.
  • Suitable for kitchen, dining/living room, patio, garden, office, coffee shop and so on.
  • encased in a fire retardant polyurethane foam shell
  • provides optimal pressure redistribution, support and comfort
  • cushion convoluted foam allows passage of air and relief of pressure for long term use

Specifications:

  • Condition: A brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged item
  • Material:Outer fabric:Polyester, Filling:Sponge
  • Long Term Usable
  • Product DImensions: ‘16X18’

    • Sizes

  • Sizes Available
  • 18 X 20

    • The post AT- Surgical Premium Quality Reusable Washable Incontinence Underpads for Children or Adults appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Magic Fingers | No Strain Hand Held Massager
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT Surgical No Strain Magic Fingers Massager is specially engineered to reduce painful stress on your hands and finger joints while massaging.

The post Magic Fingers | No Strain Hand Held Massager appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• GREAT massage tool for people that suffer from arthritis, carpal tunnel, inflammation, weak wrists, and other joint problems.
  • Reduce painful stress on your hands and finger joints while massaging.
  • A unique finger knob design allows for the application of direct pressure without pain.
  • Use the pressure point massagers to focus on small, difficult knots without discomfort.
  • Available in White, Maroon, Orange, Yellow and Blue.

The post Magic Fingers | No Strain Hand Held Massager appeared first on AT Surgical.
